name: RichCC
tagline: A rich calendar control for visualizing events implemented on top of AngularJS UI Bootstrap's Datepicker plugin.
body: # RichCC (v1.0) Sample Preview @ http://richcc.azurewebsites.net/ ##Capabilities 1. View events for all days in a month 2. View events for all days in a month with light mode enabled 3. View events for all months in a year 4. View events for all months in a year in a heat map mode (inspired by GitHub)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
